Workshop on GBD 2012

[vc_column_text]

The unit functioning to coordinate different enormous workshops at 2020/2021 on both projects (IHME and World Bank projects) once COVID 19 pandemic under the rheostat.

NDMC has conducted three days intensive training on BOD for researcher’s, FMOH, EPHI and program people for three days (March 10-12). The training was exhaustive, taken as stepping to kick other training at the center

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”601″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
